Water is H2O - two hydrogen, one oxygen.
Table salt is sodium chloride (NaCl).
Water freezes at 0°C (32°F).
Water boils at 100°C (212°F) at sea level.
Diamond rates 10 on Mohs scale.
Hydrogen has atomic number 1.
Hydrogen makes up 75% of universe's mass.
Air is 78% nitrogen, 21% oxygen.
Light travels at 299,792,458 m/s in vacuum.
At 20°C, sound travels at 343 m/s.
Photosynthesis converts CO2 and water to glucose.
Plants produce oxygen during photosynthesis.
Animals breathe oxygen and exhale CO2.
Adult humans have 206 bones.
Heart has 4 chambers: 2 atria, 2 ventricles.
Normal body temp is 37°C (98.6°F).
Skin covers about 2 m² in adults.
Stapes in ear is 2.8 mm long.
Femur (thighbone) is longest.
H2O is the chemical formula for water.
CO2 is carbon dioxide.
O2 is molecular oxygen.
RGB are primary colors of light.
RYB are traditional primary colors.
Earth rotates every 24 hours.
Earth's 23.5° tilt causes seasons.
Earth orbits Sun in 365.25 days.
Earth rotates once in 24 hours.
Gravity attracts mass.
Newton formulated law of gravitation.

Every action has equal opposite reaction.

Plants convert CO2 and water to food.
